title: An online disinformation effort ran rampant in recent days, a monitor group says.
description: A social media network of fake entities, posing as Israeli citizens, with Iranian operating characteristics, is trying to influence Israeli citizens not to vote, a report says
dc:creator: Ronen Bergman

media:content.media:credit: Avishag Shaar-Yashuv for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Supporters of the far-right, ultranationalist politician Itamar Ben-Gvir in Beit Shemesh, Israel, last month.
